name: Gamer's DeepState Issue #1: Joe Biden and the Illuminati Jizzle Maggizzle
name_original: Gamer's DeepState Issue #1: Joe Biden and the Illuminati Jizzle Maggizzle
description:
In this first issue of Gamer's DeepState, you are a child sent to see Joe Biden as the President of the United States. Will you escape the White House and its dungeons?

Part of the Gamer's DeepState collection at feed.money
